# Pull requests

Pull requests on other repos has more steps.  Since it's not your own repo you need to worry about upstream changes happening while you are making a pull request.  Here are the manual steps for doing the work, which involves both RStudio drop-down menus as well as Shell commands.  See a good review [here](https://r-bio.github.io/intro-git-rstudio/).
